solution_line_template: There are {num_nests_tree1} nests with {eggs_per_nest_tree1} eggs each so {num_nests_tree1}*{eggs_per_nest_tree1} = <<{num_nests_tree1}*{eggs_per_nest_tree1}={eggs_tree1}>>{eggs_tree1} eggs
When you add up all the eggs she has found she has {eggs_tree1}+{eggs_nest_tree2}+{eggs_nest_front_yard} = <<{eggs_tree1}+{eggs_nest_tree2}+{eggs_nest_front_yard}={total_eggs}>>{total_eggs} eggs
